overview.Le Centre de fusion de l'information mar: The Maritime Information Fusion Center (RMIFC) was presented at the 11th Madagascar International Fair (FIM) organized in Antananarivo from May 19 to 22. This Center was set up as part of the activities led by the Indian Ocean Commission (IOC) within the framework of the regional maritime security program (MASE) with European funding. Installed near the entrance to the large international hall, the stand presenting the CRFIM, its objectives and the challenge of exchanging information for maritime safety and security benefited from high visibility.
overview.Le CRFIM permet d'échanger et de fusionn: The RMIFC makes it possible to exchange and merge maritime information over an area stretching from the Cape of Good Hope (South Africa) to the Bab-El-Mandeb Strait (Djibouti) in order to strengthen maritime security and safety in the region, in particular by fighting against trafficking and crimes committed at sea.
